cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

include_directories("/home/student/ufcfvk-15-2-iot-challenge-1/game code/source")


set(YOTTA_AUTO_IOT-RPS-2PLAYER_CPP_FILES
    "/home/student/ufcfvk-15-2-iot-challenge-1/game code/source/main.cpp"
    "/home/student/ufcfvk-15-2-iot-challenge-1/game code/source/Player.cpp"
    "/home/student/ufcfvk-15-2-iot-challenge-1/game code/source/MyPlayer.cpp"
    "/home/student/ufcfvk-15-2-iot-challenge-1/game code/source/Interface.cpp"
    "/home/student/ufcfvk-15-2-iot-challenge-1/game code/source/Competitor.cpp"
)
# force dependency on the config header for cpp files, which CMake otherwise wouldn't track:
set_property(SOURCE ${YOTTA_AUTO_IOT-RPS-2PLAYER_CPP_FILES} PROPERTY OBJECT_DEPENDS "/home/student/ufcfvk-15-2-iot-challenge-1/game code/build/bbc-microbit-classic-gcc/yotta_config.h")
set(YOTTA_AUTO_IOT-RPS-2PLAYER_HEADER_FILES
    "/home/student/ufcfvk-15-2-iot-challenge-1/game code/source/MyPlayer.h"
    "/home/student/ufcfvk-15-2-iot-challenge-1/game code/source/Interface.h"
    "/home/student/ufcfvk-15-2-iot-challenge-1/game code/source/Competitor.h"
    "/home/student/ufcfvk-15-2-iot-challenge-1/game code/source/Player.h"
)
# force dependency on the config header for header files, which CMake otherwise wouldn't track:
set_property(SOURCE ${YOTTA_AUTO_IOT-RPS-2PLAYER_HEADER_FILES} PROPERTY OBJECT_DEPENDS "/home/student/ufcfvk-15-2-iot-challenge-1/game code/build/bbc-microbit-classic-gcc/yotta_config.h")


add_executable (iot-rps-2player
    ${YOTTA_AUTO_IOT-RPS-2PLAYER_CPP_FILES}
    ${YOTTA_AUTO_IOT-RPS-2PLAYER_HEADER_FILES}
)
set_target_properties(iot-rps-2player PROPERTIES ENABLE_EXPORTS ON)

yotta_postprocess_target(EXECUTABLE iot-rps-2player)



target_link_libraries(iot-rps-2player
    microbit
)
